title: How an article in The Atlantic ‘transformed’ Anne-Marie Slaughter’s life trajectory

title: Anne-Marie Slaughter | World Leaders Forum
snippet: From 2002-2009, Dr. Slaughter was the Dean of Princeton's Woodrow Wilson School of Public and International Affairs, a position she held from 2002–2009. She rebuilt the School's international relations faculty and programs, recruiting a distinguished group of senior scholars.
